description:
Constructs an operating system specific path of the specified segments.

Example:
1. {
  "directory": "/home/user1/dir1",
  "basename": "foo",
  "extension": ".txt"
}@0 received on `components`
2. "/home/user1/dir1/foo.txt"@0 sent on `path`

94c10e1e-15a5-4a1a-94fa-88f6279dd9e3.description:
Receives the components to build the path from.

Example (Windows): 
{
  "directory": "C:/Users/User1/dir1",
  "basename": "foo",
  "extension": ".txt"
}

Example (OSX & *nix): 
{
  "directory": "/home/user1/dir1",
  "basename": "foo",
  "extension": ".txt"
}

(To keep the application portable use "/" as path separator.)
94c10e1e-15a5-4a1a-94fa-88f6279dd9e3.name: components

fd474d6f-8b92-420c-b58b-da44d233e028.description:
Sends the resulting path.

Example (Windows):
"C:/Users/User1/dir1/foo.txt"

Example (OSX & *nix):
"/home/user1/dir1/foo.txt"
fd474d6f-8b92-420c-b58b-da44d233e028.name: path

name: io/file/Path builder
